Package io.github.pirateducks.pathfinding

Class PathFinder

java.lang.Object
io.github.pirateducks.pathfinding.PathFinder
public class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
A class used to take a level and produce pathfinding results

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PathFinder​(LevelManager manager, int gradient)
    NOTE: the greater the gradient, the less accurate the result is to the true result but results will be generated faster

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Checkpoint> getPath​(float sourceX, float sourceY, float destinationX, float destinationY)  
    boolean isTraversable​(float x, float y)
    Used to lookup a location in the tilemap to check if the location is traversable

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • PathFinder

      public PathFinder​(LevelManager manager, int gradient)
      NOTE: the greater the gradient, the less accurate the result is to the true result but results will be generated faster
      Parameters:
      manager - The LevelManager to generate the search space from
      gradient - How small each tile in the tilemap should be (ie 5 game units large tiles)

  • Method Details

    • getPath

      public java.util.List<Checkpoint> getPath​(float sourceX, float sourceY, float destinationX, float destinationY)
      Parameters:
      sourceX - the x source locaiton
      sourceY - the y source location
      destinationX - the x destination
      destinationY - the y destination
      Returns:
      the path as a list of checkpoint, or null if no path could be found

    • isTraversable

      public boolean isTraversable​(float x, float y)
      Used to lookup a location in the tilemap to check if the location is traversable
      Parameters:
      x - the x coord in game space
      y - the y coord in game space
      Returns:
      if the location is traversable
